name: CallBreak Nova
description:
Call break is Strategic trick-based card game popular in Nepal & India very similar to Spades but without teams.

We have packaged game with awesome features like
- Smart AI giving you a hard challenge
- 5+ themes
- 5+ Decks

Additionally you can play other games designed by us as a part of Nova Cards Game Platform
- HOKM
- Dehla Pakad ( Mindi )
- Spades
- Tarneeb ( Tarnib )
